overview:
Digital media planner, creative strategist and thought leader with background in business and leadership development.

Involved with sales and marketing since 1996. Experienced with the many aspects of online marketing ranging from search engine marketing, display and video advertising, mobile advertising, and social media marketing. Currently managing multiple Twitter accounts, Facebook groups & pages, Linkedin groups, and other social media networks. Working with industry leaders and fortune 500 companies to develop and implement digital marketing strategies ranging from lead acquisition, traffic generation to brand awareness.

Oversees and leads multiple business and leadership groups in addition to owning & managing personal news/blog site.

milestones.description: Published in Wall Street Journal for Subject Matter Expertise in Social Media Marketing
milestones.source_description: Wannabe Cool Kids Aim to Game the Web's New Social Scorekeepers

milestones.description: Published Yahoo case study for client show-casing the ability to impact offline sales with online ads
milestones.source_description: Value City Furniture Case Study: Value City Furniture Drives In-Store Sales With Yahoo! My Display Ads
